Opinion
Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Christman, Appellant.
Submitted September 28, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.

January 7, 1971:
